name: EndscreenTweaks
description: Various tweaks to the endscreen. (Formerly WholesomeEndTexts.)

configdir.name: Config Directory: Manage Custom Texts
configdir.desc:
<cy>(Hopefully.)</c>
This setting does literally nothing new except being a button that acts as a shortcut to open the config directory for this mod (which is kind of important for using this mod properly, because this is where you will store your custom end level screen splash texts), because the legendary developers in the Geode Team themselves forgot to add a shortcut button that would have done this exact same thing, and I have gotten far too many folks (rightfully) asking me to find the config directory when using some of my other mods, and I hate repeating the same things over and over again, and I don't know if the next major update for Geode will also repeat this mistake where HJfod forgets to include a config directory shortcut button, so this setting and this button are here for extra insurance, so please enjoy this extra button, I guess. Anyway, by the time you're finished reading this, your device should be finished with opening the config directory; press "Aight" to close this window.

endTexts.name: Change Endscreen Texts
endTexts.description: Toggles the main feature of the mod: changing the endscreen text!

custom.name: custom.txt Endscreen Texts
custom.description:
Includes your own custom "Level Complete" text.
Please edit the "custom.txt" file by opening this mod's config directory (look for the golden pencil button at the bottom left of the mod's introductory screen).

customTextsOnly.name: Only Use custom.txt Endscreen Texts
customTextsOnly.description:
Only uses your own custom "New Best" texts from "custom.txt" file.

If no custom quotes are found, the mod will fall back to the default set of quotes.

<cr>Enabling this setting will override the "Include Technoblade" setting if you have written your own custom quotes.</c>

default.name: Default Set of Endscreen Texts
default.description: Includes the default set of Endscreen Texts from this mod.

technoblade.name: Technoblade (o7)
technoblade.description: Includes quotes from Minecraft YouTuber Technoblade.

snl50.name: SNL50
snl50.description: Includes quotes from Saturday Night Live (one from each season, hopefully).

maxScale.name: Endscreen Text Max Scale
maxScale.description: Sets the max scale of all end text messages.

customFont.name: Endscreen Text Font #
customFont.description:
Sets the font of all end text messages. 0 for Pusab, -1 for Golden Pusab, -2 for chatFont.
All other numbers: use the level editor, find the font each number corresponds to, subtract that number by 1, then put it here.

customLevelCompleteText.name: Change "Level Complete" Text
customLevelCompleteText.description:
<cl>Original idea by Saritahh.</c>

Replaces the original "Level Complete" text when completing a level with *either* custom text with Oxygene One <cy>(the font used in the original "Level Complete" font)</c>, or an image of your choice <cy>(selected from this mod's config directory)</c>.

customLCTMode.name: Custom "Level Complete" Text Mode
customLCTMode.description:
<cl>Original idea by Saritahh.</c>

Choose your preferred "Level Complete" replacement. <cy>"Oxygene One"</c> creates messages in <cl>the Oxygene One font</c>. <cy>"Images"</c> are pulled from <cl>this mod's config directory</c>. <cy>"Combined"</c> picks one from both.

alsoReplacePlayLayerLCT.name: Also Replace "Level Complete" in PlayLayer
alsoReplacePlayLayerLCT.description:
<cl>Original idea by Saritahh.</c>

<cl>Disabled</c> leaves PlayLayer's "Level Complete" untouched. <cl>Match EndLevelLayer</c> matches replacements with the endscreen. <cl>Separate From EndLevelLayer</c> generates a separate replacement for the endscreen.

customLevelCompleteTextsOnly.name: Only Use customLevelCompleteQuotes.txt Texts for "Level Complete"
customLevelCompleteTextsOnly.description:
<cl>Original idea by Saritahh.</c> <cp>REQUIRES GAME RESTART TO APPLY.</c>

Only uses your own custom "Level Complete" texts from "customLevelCompleteQuotes.txt" file when using a custom "Level Complete" text in the "Oxygene One".

If no custom quotes are found, the mod will fall back to the default set of quotes.

scaleCustomLevelCompleteImages.name: Custom "Level Complete" Images Scaling Correction
scaleCustomLevelCompleteImages.description:
<cl>Original idea by Saritahh.</c>

Corrects the sizing of your custom "Level Complete" images.

platAttemptsAndJumps.name: Plat. Attempts + Jumps
platAttemptsAndJumps.description: Shows your attempt and jump count on the "Level Complete" screen when completing Platformer levels.

classicFlukedFrom.name: Classic "Fluked From" %
classicFlukedFrom.description:
<cl>Original idea by yolodomo.</c>

Shows your last best percentage on the "Level Complete" screen when completing Classic levels.

<cy>To disable, set this setting to "[Disabled]". Otherwise, choose a prefix for this label to enable this feature.</c>

<cr>I am not responsible if some of these prefix options will overlap past the borders of the endscreen or the level completion rewards; go experiment on your own.</c>

dontShowFlukeIfZero.name: Don't Show "Fluked From" If 0%
dontShowFlukeIfZero.description: Skips showing your prior best percentage if the prior best was 0%.

showModsListButton.name: Mods List Button
showModsListButton.description:
<cp>Formerly part of ErysEdits.</c>
Adds a "Mods List" button at the lower left of EndLevelLayer.

<cy>(The more mods you have installed, the more likely this option may cause some FPS drops if the button is pressed. Be careful!)</c>

hideHideEndscreen.name: Hide "Hide Endscreen" Button
hideHideEndscreen.description:
Hides the "Hide Endscreen" button from EndLevelLayer. (Still clickable, just invisible.)

<cy>(Enabling this option will also hide the sprite of the extra button added from enabling the "Hide EndLevelLayer" option.)</c>

hideEndLevelLayer.name: Auto Hide EndLevelLayer
hideEndLevelLayer.description:
Hides the EndLevelLayer on level completion. Adds an extra button to toggle the EndLevelLayer's visibility.

<cy>This also hides the rewards animation on completing levels.</c>

noTransition.name: No Bouncing Transition
noTransition.description: Disables the bouncing transition when showing EndLevelLayer.

editTransition.name: Edit Bouncing Transition
editTransition.description: Change the bouncing transition when showing EndLevelLayer. Note that __enabling `No Bouncing Transition` or `Fast Menu` from GD's vanilla settings__ will disable this setting and all other related settings.

backdropOpacityRated.name: Backdrop Opacity (Rated Levels)
backdropOpacityRated.description: Adjust the opacity of the backdrop of EndLevelLayer when completing a rated level.

backdropOpacity.name: Backdrop Opacity
backdropOpacity.description: Adjust the opacity of the backdrop of EndLevelLayer when completing a non-rated level.

backdropColorRated.name: Backdrop Color (Rated Levels)
backdropColorRated.description: Adjust the color of the backdrop of EndLevelLayer when completing a rated level.

backdropColor.name: Backdrop Color
backdropColor.description: Adjust the color of the backdrop of EndLevelLayer when completing a non-rated level.

initialFallDownDuration.name: Initial Falling Down Duration
initialFallDownDuration.description: Adjust the duration of the initial EndLevelLayer falling down animation.

robtopFallUpHideDuration.name: "Hiding" Falling Up Duration
robtopFallUpHideDuration.description: Adjust the duration of the EndLevelLayer falling up animation that happens when "hiding" using the vanilla button.

robtopFallDownHideDuration.name: "Hiding" Falling Down Duration
robtopFallDownHideDuration.description: Adjust the duration of the EndLevelLayer falling down animation that happens when "hiding" using the vanilla button.

issues.info: To disable hyphen prefixes and suffixes in custom messages, edit saved.json. For other issues, ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
